alert.note: Alert for Northern Sweet Grass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 27 at 2:35PM MST until January 29 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...West to southwest wind gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Sweet Grass. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong crosswinds will make travel difficult along Highway 191 from Big Timber north towards Judith Gap.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route.
